This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

If you're a US citizen who lives abroad, YOU CAN VOTE in the upcoming #2024Election.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

Check the newsletter, blog & socials for our daily music tips, podcast & playlists.

Close your eyes when listening.

note: A husband, father, actor, director, & a climate justice advocate with an eye out for a better, brighter, cleaner, & more hopeful future for all of us.

"I'd like to help you Frank, but I'm cardboard." Audio editor, 8 track nut. Past lives: archival researcher/producer, venue booker, bandmate, critic on payroll, record store clerk, WECB's The Night Ridah!!! #MirrorStars #BLACKCREAM #APWU100  "These days live in infamy but only in your head." The truth is out there. 🦉
